succeeded.description: The number of tokens with successful metadata refreshes

type.description:
Type of the metadata. Values: "enum", "text", "boolean", "continuous", "discrete" | Default: "text".
Src: https://docs.x.immutable.com/docs/asset-metadata#property-type-mapping
Type of the metadata. Values: "enum", "text", "boolean", "continuous", "discrete" | Default: "text". Src: https://docs.x.immutable.com/docs/asset-metadata#property-type-mapping

token.description: Details of the asset which has been minted

transaction_id.description: Sequential ID of transaction in Immutable X

user.description: Ethereum address of the user to whom the asset has been minted

id.description:
Token ID
Note: While the Token ID is required to be a string, it still needs to be a valid uint256 as per the ERC-721 token standard.

client_token_id.description: ID provided by the client for this token

provider_wallet_address.description: Provider wallet address that was used for transferring crypto

amount_sold.description: Amount of the asset already sold by this order

buy.description: Details of the asset being bought

sell.description: Details of the asset being sold

user.description: Ethereum address of the user who submitted the order

collection_limit_expires_at.description: The current period expiry date for collection limit

collection_remaining.description: The number of collection remaining in the current period

contact_email.description: The project contact email (must be registered as a developer account with Immutable at https://hub.immutable.com)

mint_limit_expires_at.description: The current period expiry date for mint operation limit

mint_monthly_limit.description: The total monthly mint operation limit

mint_remaining.description: The number of mint operation remaining in the current period

ether_key.description: The ether key of the user

stark_key.description: Public stark key of the user

amount.description: Amount of the token to transfer

receiver.description: Ethereum address of the receiving user

amount.description: Amount of the asset being transferred

asset_id.description: ID of the asset being transferred

expiration_timestamp.description: Timestamp when this transfer will expire

payload_hash.description: Hash of the payload to be signed for transfer

receiver_vault_id.description: ID of the vault being transferred to

sender_vault_id.description: ID of the vault being transferred from

token.description: Token in request to match in SDK implementation

decimals.description: Number of decimals supported by this asset

quantity.description: Quantity of this asset - inclusive of fees for buy order in v1 API and exclusive of fees in v3 API

quantity_with_fees.description: Quantity of this asset with the sum of all fees applied to the asset

image_url.description: Url for the icon of the token

name.description: Full name of the token (e.g. Ether)

a.description: Side A of this trade (the buy order)

b.description: Side B of this trade (the sell order)

transaction_id.description: Sequential ID of this trade within Immutable X

order_id.description: The ID of the order involved in the trade

sold.description: The amount of that order's asset this trade sold

token_address.description: The contract address of the token that this trade sold

token_id.description: The ID of the token that this trade sold

token_type.description: The type of the token that this trade sold

receiver.description: Ethereum address of the user who received this transfer

user.description: Ethereum address of the user  who submitted this transfer

asset_id.description: ID of the asset to transfer

receiver_stark_key.description: Public stark key of the user receiving the transfer

receiver_vault_id.description: ID of the vault into which the asset will be transferred to

sender_vault_id.description: ID of the vault into which the asset is from

collection_image_url.description: URL of the tile image for this collection

icon_url.description: URL of the icon for this collection

metadata_api_url.description: URL of the metadata for this collection

amount.description: Amount that will be prefilled in the widget

supported_currencies.description: Currencies that will be available in the widget. If not defined all available currencies will be shown

rollup_status.description: Status of the on-chain batch confirmation for this withdrawal

sender.description: Ethereum address of the user who requested this withdrawal

timestamp.description: Time when this withdrawal was initiated

token.description: Details of the asset this user is withdrawing

withdrawn_to_wallet.description: Withdrawal has been transferred to user's Layer 1 wallet

data.description: Extra token information to be encoded

type.description: The type of the token to be encoded

wallet_address.description: Ethereum address of the user who created transaction

contract_address.description: Contract address of the asset to be created

user_wallet_address.description: Ethereum address of the user who wants to create transaction

contract_address.description: Contract address of the asset to be created

offer_id.description: Temporary asset id. Might be a token id if the token id is known or a generic description if it's not

seller_wallet_address.description: Wallet address that will receive the payment (in crypto) from the checkout provider for the minted NFT

token_id.description: ID of the token that has been successfully minted - should be the same as `offer_id`

url.description: NFT purchase URL given by the checkout provider that the user can use to complete payment

user_wallet_address.description: Ethereum address of the user who wants to create transaction

offer_id.description: Temporary asset id. Might be a token id if the token id is known or a generic description if it's not

status.description: Transaction status enums(created, waitingPayment, pending, completed, failed)

token_id.description: ID of the token that has been successfully minted - might or not be the same as `offer_id`

user_wallet_address.description: Wallet address that receives the minted NFT

cursor.description: Generated cursor returned by previous query

remaining.description: Remaining results flag. 1: there are remaining results matching this query, 0: no remaining results

created_at.description: Timestamp when the transaction was created

fees_amount.description: Fees to pay on this transaction

from_amount.description: Amount of the currency specified in `from_currency` that the buyer paid for the transaction

from_currency.description: Currency that the buyer used for the transaction

mint_id.description: Minting transaction ID - see mintTokens response

offer_id.description: Temporary asset id. Might be a token id if the token id is known or a generic description if it's not

status.description: Transaction status enums(created, waitingPayment, pending, completed, failed)

to_amount.description: Amount of the currency specified in `to_currency` that the seller received from the checkout provider for the transaction

to_currency.description: Currency (crypto) that the checkout provider sent to the seller for the transaction

token_id.description: ID of the token that has been successfully minted - should be the same as `offer_id`

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the transaction was updated

user_wallet_address.description: Wallet address that receives the minted NFT
